text: This is a list of Argentine billionaires based on an annual assessment of wealth and assets compiled and published by Forbes magazine in 2020. == 2020 Argentine billionaires list == {| class="wikitable" !World Rank !Name !Citizenship !Net worth (USD) !Source of wealth |- |764 |Alejandro Bulgheroni | |2.7 billion |oil & gas |- |875 |Alberto Roemmers | |2.4 billion |pharmaceuticals |- |1063 |Marcos Galperin | |2 billion |e-commerce |- |1267 |Gregorio Pérez Companc | |1.7 billion |oil & gas |} == See also == * The World's Billionaires * List of countries by the number of billionaires == References == Category:Lists of people by wealth Net worth
title: List of Argentines by net worth
